Metadata.Title: Sign Code that You Are Distributing
Metadata.DirectLink: Sign Code that You Are Distributing

Content.Data:
What to Do

If you are providing the code that is to be downloaded, such as for automatic updates of your software, then use cryptographic signatures for your code and modify your download clients to verify the signatures. Ensure that your implementation does not contain CWE-295, CWE-320, CWE-347, and related weaknesses. Use code signing technologies such as Authenticode.

Additional Resources

  • For more information about "CWE-295: Certificate Issues", please see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/295.html
  • For more information about "CWE-320: Key Management Errors", please see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/320.html
  • For more information about "CWE-347: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature", please see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/347.html
